title: 求大神，帮我看看崩溃纪录
author: XUESHE
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I'm sorry, Dave.

Time: 15-8-21 下午2:53
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: 凋零、
replies.txt_content:
好像是增加生命上限mod有问题

你在说下是怎么崩的，是一启动就崩溃还是载入存档后崩溃还是做某种操作崩溃（改变设置，放置方块，打开背包）还是玩着玩着就崩溃了的

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 把增加生命上限mod   More-Health-Enhanced-Mod-1.7.10.zip用压缩包打开，看看com/nohero/morehealth目录下有没有mod_moreHealthEnhanced.class，没有就重下，有的话还是删掉这个mod算了。

replies.author: XUESHE
replies.txt_content:
ItIsEnderman 发表于 2015-8-22 08:52
把增加生命上限mod   More-Health-Enhanced-Mod-1.7.10.zip用压缩包打开，看看com/nohero/morehealth目录下 ...
谢谢大神，已经解决了
